title: Boutique Heritage Glamour in Country Victoria
description: Escape to scenic East Gippsland and unwind in elegance at the historic Riversleigh - the perfect weekend escape. Stay three days/two nights in a Classic Queen Room and enjoy daily continental buffet breakfasts, a bottle of premium wine and chocolates on arrival, a decadent afternoon tea experience and late midday checkout for two.

title: Heritage Glamour in Country Victoria
description: Escape to scenic East Gippsland and unwind in elegance at the historic Riversleigh, in the heart of beautiful Bairnsdale. Leave the city life behind and head for the hills with a two-night stay in a Classic Queen Room, enjoying daily continental buffet breakfast and a late midday check out.

title: Boutique Heritage Stay in Country Victoria
description: Escape to scenic East Gippsland and unwind in elegance at the historic Riversleigh - the perfect weekend escape. Stay in a cosy Classic Queen Room and enjoy a daily continental breakfast, a bottle of wine and chocolates on arrival, a decadent afternoon tea experience and more.
